solution_line_template: Before his maize is stolen, the maize he stores at the end of 2 years is {months_per_year}*{years}= <<{months_per_year}*{years}={maize_stored}>>{maize_stored} tonnes of maize.
After his maize is stolen, he is left with {maize_stored}-{maize_stolen}=<<{maize_stored}-{maize_stolen}={maize_after_theft}>>{maize_after_theft} tonnes of maize.
After he receives the maize donation, he has {maize_after_theft}+{maize_donation}=<<{maize_after_theft}+{maize_donation}={maize_final}>>{maize_final} tonnes of maize.
